name: Creative Writing Workshops
description: Offering fourteen in-person creative writing workshops for Bay Area kids and teens (ages 4-18) at our Dogpatch and Sunset neighborhood hubs in San Francisco. The typical programs include creative writing, essay and college-essay writing, and specialty options such as playwriting, debate, role‑playing, and game-based storytelling, with small class sizes that keep workshops intimate and student-centered.​
